name: Vadim Vatrya
aboutText: I'm from Kherson. Front-end technologies are the most promising and developing IT industry. My primary target is to get job in a good team for further education JavaScript, NodeJS and framework ReactJS. I want to grow and develop in these technologies. You can see the projects on these technologies below. I'm an enthusiastic and look forward new challenges.
skillsText: Responsive and adaptive design, BEM, HTML, CSS,   SASS/SCSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, NPM, Gulp, Webpack, Git, Figma, Adobe Photoshop.
